reviewText: Checa finally keeps it rubber side down!!!!!!!!!!!!
Im content with the dvd but i really wished that they would come out with them on blu ray.

I like watching these when I'm on the treadmill in the basement.  The coverage and DVD's have gotten better and better year after year for these.  The amount of coverage increases almost every year - I like having 2 CD's to watch!  Also nice that they often have the winner give an interview after the race - fun to see/hear them as a person.
